sqlMap.select: Select iid,ipid,ccode,cname,cuser,cpassword,cport,cphoneprefix,cmemo,caddress from as_smsset where 1=1 order by ccode
sqlMap.insert:
insert into as_smsset (ipid,ccode,cname,cuser, cpassword, cport,cphoneprefix,cmemo,caddress) values( #ipid#, #ccode#, #cname#,#cuser#, #cpassword#,#cport#,#cphoneprefix#,#cmemo#,#caddress#)
select @@identity as iid
sqlMap.delete: begin delete from as_smsset where ipid = #iid# delete from as_smsset where iid = #iid# end;
